derivation_steps.description: Derive b₃ = 24 from TCS topology formula
Derive b₂ = 4 from K3 matching with π/6 involution
derivation_steps.formula: b₂(M) = rk(N₊ ∩ N₋) + dim(k₊) + dim(k₋) + involution_adjustment

derivation_steps.description: G₂ holonomy from parallel spinor existence
derivation_steps.reference: Joyce, D. (2000) 'Compact Manifolds with Special Holonomy', Theorem 10.2.10

derivation_steps.description: Derive Ricci-flatness from torsion-free G₂ structure
Effective Euler characteristic from Hodge/Betti numbers
Derive n_gen = 3 from Atiyah-Singer index theorem
G₂ → SU(3) × SU(2) × U(1) representation branching
derivation_steps.reference: Slansky, R. (1981) 'Group Theory for Unified Model Building' Phys. Rep. 79
